name: The One
description:
Welcome to The One. This project is more than just a game; it's a gateway to an immersive Post-Apocalyptic and survival experience.

Key Features:

  • Agriculture & Resource Gathering: Engage in farming, mining, deforestation, and resource extraction to sustain your existence.


  • Exploration: Traverse an expansive map, from serene landscapes to perilous territories, and everything in between.


  • Builiding System: Build a shelter to survive attacks from zombies or other enemies.


  • Survival Challenges: Battle hunger, thirst, and environmental extremes that affect your character's well-being.


  • Combat & Zombie Encounters: Face off against menacing zombies, employing strategic combat to survive.


  • Weapon Customization: Modify weapons to suit your style and enhance your survival chances.

  • Diverse Quests: Immerse yourself in a multitude of missions, each offering unique challenges and rewards.
